00039 TICK timeline::look_ahead() const {
00040   return owned()?owner().getLookAhead():0;

00047 // modifiers :
00048 
00049 bool timeline::assign(TeleoReactor &r) {
00050   bool ret = true;
00051   
00052   if( NULL==m_owner ) {
00053     client_set::iterator pos = m_clients.find(r.getName());
00054     
00055     if( m_clients.end()!=pos ) {
00056       unsubscribe(Relation(this, pos));
00057       ret = false;
00058     }
00059     m_owner = &r;
00060     r.assigned(this);
00061     latency_update(0);
00062   } else if( !owned_by(r) ) 
00063     throw MultipleInternals(r, name(), owner());
00064   return ret;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void timeline::unassign(TICK date, bool demotion, bool control) {
00068   if( owned() ) {
00069     TeleoReactor *tmp = m_owner;
00070     
00071     m_owner->unassigned(this);
00072     m_owner = NULL;
00073     postObservation(date, Observation(name(), s_failed));
00074     latency_update(tmp->getExecLatency());
00075     if( demotion ) 
00076       subscribe(*tmp, control);
00077   }
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool timeline::subscribe(TeleoReactor &r, bool control) {
00081   if( owned_by(r) )
00082     return false;
00083   else {
00084     std::pair<client_set::iterator, bool>
00085       ins = m_clients.insert(std::make_pair(&r, control));
00086     
00087     if( ins.second ) 
00088       r.subscribed(Relation(this, ins.first));
00089     else if( control )
00090       ins.first->second = true;
00091     return ins.second;
00092   }
00093 }
00094 
00095 void timeline::unsubscribe(Relation const &rel) {
00096   rel.client().unsubscribed(rel);
00097   m_clients.erase(rel.m_pos);
00098 }
00099 
00100 void timeline::postObservation(TICK date, Observation const &obs) {
00101   m_obsDate = date;
00102   m_lastObs = obs;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void timeline::request(goal_id const &g) {
00106   if( owned() ) {
00107     owner().syslog(name().str())<<"Request received "<<g->predicate()<<'['<<g<<"].";
00108     owner().handleRequest(g);
00109   }
00110 }
00111 
00112 void timeline::recall(goal_id const &g) {
00113   if( owned() )
00114     owner().handleRecall(g);
00115 }
00116 
00117 void timeline::latency_update(TICK prev) {
00118   if( look_ahead()>0 ) 
00119     for(client_set::const_iterator i=m_clients.begin(); m_clients.end()!=i; ++i) 
00120       if( i->second )
00121        i->first->latency_updated(prev, latency());
00122 }

00124 /*
00125  * class TREX::transaction::details::relation_iter
00126  */
00127 
00128 relation_iter::relation_iter(timeline_set::const_iterator const &it, 
00129                           timeline_set::const_iterator const &last)
00130   :m_pos(it), m_last(last) {
00131   if( m_pos!=m_last ) {
00132     m_rel = (*m_pos)->begin();
00133     next_valid();
00134   }
00135 }
00136 
00137 void relation_iter::increment() {
00138   if( m_pos!=m_last ) {
00139     ++m_rel;
00140     next_valid();
00141   }
00142 }
00143 
00144 
00145 void relation_iter::next_valid() {
00146   while( (*m_pos)->end()==m_rel ) {
00147     ++m_pos;
00148     if( m_pos==m_last )
00149       return;
00150     m_rel = (*m_pos)->begin();
00151   }
00152 }
00153 
00154 bool relation_iter::equal(relation_iter const &other) const {
00155   return m_pos==other.m_pos && ( m_pos==m_last || m_rel==other.m_rel );
00156 }

00158 /*
00159  * class TREX::transaction::Relation
00160  */
00161 
00162 void Relation::unsubscribe() const {
00163   if( valid() )
00164     m_timeline->unsubscribe(*this);
00165 }
00166 
00167 // Observers 
00168 bool Relation::accept_goals() const {
00169   return active() && m_pos->second && m_timeline->look_ahead()>0;
00170 }
00171 
00172 TICK Relation::latency() const {
00173   return valid()?m_timeline->latency():0;
00174 }
00175 
00176 TICK Relation::look_ahead() const {
00177   return accept_goals()?m_timeline->look_ahead():0;
00178 }
00179 
00180 bool Relation::valid() const {
00181   return NULL!=m_timeline && m_timeline->m_clients.end()!=m_pos;
00182 }
00183 
00184 bool Relation::active() const {
00185   return valid() && m_timeline->owned();
00186 }
00187 
00188 TICK Relation::lastObsDate() const {
00189   return m_timeline->lastObsDate();
00190 }

00194 Observation const &Relation::lastObservation() const {
00195   return m_timeline->lastObservation();

00198 utils::Symbol const &Relation::name() const {
00199   return m_timeline->name();
00200 }

00202 TeleoReactor &Relation::server() const {
00203   return m_timeline->owner();

00208   return m_timeline->recall(g);
